page.syntax: ResultFlag as L = SetPrimaryProcessor(CPUIndex as N)

argument.name: ResultFlag
argument.description: Numeric. .T. (TRUE) if the assignment was successful. .F. (FALSE) if the assignment failed.

argument.name: CPUIndex
argument.description: The number of the processor. The first processor is 0. Numeric

page.description: Set the index of the primary CPU for the process.
page.discussion: The SetPrimaryProcessor() function sets the primary processor. If the value is less than zero or greater than the number of CPUs - 1, the function returns .F. .

section.title: Example
section.description: This example sets Alpha Anywhere to run on the first processor.
